sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Axios from 'axios'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faUpload } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import axios from 'axios'; import apiBasePath from './globalVars'; function EditAlbum() { const { id } = useParams() const [formData, setFormData] = useState( { artist: "", title: "", genre: "", recordLabel: "", releaseDate: null, description: "", rating: null, coverImage: "" } ); useEffect( () => { Axios.get(apiBasePath + '/getalbum/' + id) .then( res => { console.log(formData.artist) console.log(res.data[0].artist) setFormData( formData.artist = res.data[0].artist, formData.title = res.data[0].title, formData.genre = res.data[0].genre, formData.recordLabel = res.data[0].recordLabel, formData.releaseDate = res.data[0].releaseDate, formData.description = res.data[0].description, formData.rating = res.data[0].rating, formData.coverImage = res.data[0].coverImage ) } ) }, [] ) const handleChange = event => { setFormData( { ...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value } ); }; useEffect( () => { console.log(formData) }, [formData] ) const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(apiBasePath + '/addalbum') console.log(formData) axios.post(apiBasePath + '/addalbum', formData) .then( res => { console.log(res); } ) .catch( err => { console.log(err); } ) .finally( () => { console.log('here'); } ) }; return ( <>
